title: Help: Ant Build updateSchema - Build Failed
description:
I am trying to setup the Management example from the chapter 2(My first OX project) in OX3.1.1, when I run "ant updateSchema" I am getting Build Failed error:
E:\Projects\OpenXava\openxava-3.1.1\workspace\Management\build.xml:38: The following error occurred
while executing this line:
E:\Projects\OpenXava\openxava-3.1.1\workspace\OpenXava\build.xml:963: Persistence unit not found: 'junit'.

This <property name="persistence.unit" value="junit"/> in build.xml is default value set by OX3.1.1. I want to know what's correct value need to be set to or how can I fix it?

OK, I figured out the problem. I must imported OpenXava and Management as projects in Eclipse and let the Eclipse build the projects.  Ant updateSchemaJPA relies on the web/WEB-INF/classes.
it's success after build the project
